title: List of songs in Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock
summary: Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock is the third release in the Guitar Hero series of music video games.  This game is the first in the series to be developed by Neversoft, and was distributed by RedOctane and Activision.  The game was released on the PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3, Wii, and Xbox 360 game consoles, and also for Microsoft Windows and Apple Macintosh personal computers.
